entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Mr. President I called my Doctor to ask if perhaps as like you suggest we inject or maybe digest disinfectants to kill the coronavirus. He said ARE YOU NUTS??? I said it wasn't my suggestion. It was our Presidents.
